name: Legendary
description: Mythic items that have been transmuted to get additional attributes. Items have a chance to fracture when transmuted.

name: Unique
description: Items with special attributes and random name as they are magically enchanted.

name: Mythic
description: Items that are beyond the rarest of the rare.

name: Epic
description: Items that are very rare, about 1 / 10000, or given by an npc for doing a quest, although quite rare.

name: Rare
description: Items that are somewhat rare, about 1 / 50. Often given for quest completion.

name: Magical
description: Items with special attributes and random name as they are magically enchanted.

name: Normal
description: Items that have stronger benefits together than separately.

name: Set
description: Items that have stronger benefits together than separately.

name: Quest
description: Items which are given until a person completes the quest, time expires, or permanently but cannot be traded.
